text: Warren Amerine Stephens (born February 18, 1957) is an American businessman and politician who has been the 68th United States Ambassador to the United Kingdom since 2025. He was the chairman, president and chief executive officer (CEO) of Stephens Inc., an investment bank. In December 2024, President-elect Donald Trump nominated Stephens to be the U.S. Ambassador to the United Kingdom. On February 12, 2025, his nomination was sent to the Senate. His nomination was confirmed by a vote of 59-39 on April 29, 2025. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Politicians from Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:American chief executives Category:American billionaires Category:Ambassadors of the United States to the United Kingdom
title: Warren Stephens
